# Causal inference in fairness

This work approaches fair machine learning from a causal inference perspective, arguing that determining what is fair is a similar challenge to determining causality.

### Press

Some of this work was covered in the [New Scientist](https://www.newscientist.com/article/mg23431195-300-bias-test-to-prevent-algorithms-discriminating-unfairly/) and [36Kr](https://36kr.com/p/5106656.html).
